featured.text: They can be round like the moon, long like a jackknife, or shaped like boxes, fans, or tops.
This “Charlie Brown effect” will be more 19 when the astronauts go on their Mars missions, which will take about three years to complete, much longer than missions to the moon.
In the earlier days of space travel, scientists tried to overcome the force of gravity so that a rocket could shoot 16 Earth’s pull in order to land humans on the moon.
According to this passage, the cook of the Moon Lake Restaurant _______.
The Moon Lake Restaurant’s menu included French-fried potatoes, a popular food recipe brought back from France by Thomas Jefferson.

definition.zh_def: 月亮，地球的天然衛星，圍繞地球運行。
definition.en_def: The moon is the natural satellite of the Earth, orbiting around it.
definition.example: The moon shines brightly in the night sky.
